content:
Hello all. We are trying to migrate the Vital Signs IG (http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/cimi-vital-signs/) to the latest IG template before publication. Is there documentation we can use to complete this task?

@Monique van Berkum @Nathan Davis

github.com/fhir/sample-ig is a good IG to mirror. Documentation on the use of the templates is found here: http://build.fhir.org/ig/FHIR/ig-guidance/using-templates.html. There's no documentation for migration because - prior to the template approach - everyone's structure was a bit different.
